committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of July 2, 1962, to authorize intrastate quarantines under extraordinary emergency conditions.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Amends Federal law to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to prohibit intrastate movement of livestock and poultry, meat products, and animal carcasses in order to prevent or eradicate communicable animal diseases. Requires the Secretary to review and find State and local measures inadequate, and to consult with the Governor of such State, before announcing any such prohibition or regulation. Requires announcement in the Federal Register, with findings and reasons, before any action is taken.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of July 2, 1962, to authorize intrastate quarantines under extraordinary emergency conditions.
